alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Nassau and north central Duval Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Kingsland. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Nassau and north central Duval Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Western Duval
